title: FALLING DOWN - WIDESCREEN_1993_DVD_NTSC - [OS128]
description:
Title: Falling Down

Genre: Comedy/Crime/Drama/Thriller

Year: 1993

Director: Joel Schumacher

Cast: Michael Douglas, Robert Duvall, Barbara Hershey, Tuesday Weld, Rachael Ticotin, Frederic Forrest, Lois Smith, Joey Hope Singer, Ebbe Roe Smith, Michael Paul Chan, Raymond J. Barry, D.W. Moffett, Steve Park, Kimberly Scott, James Keane

Synopsis: Two Oscar winners star in this dark comedy by Joel Schumacher. It&#039;s a hot summer day in L.A., and Bill Foster (Michael Douglas) is having a very bad day. He&#039;s just been fired from his defense-industry job and a traffic jam is making him late to his daughter&#039;s birthday party. With his temper fraying, Foster begins walking and runs into one obstacle after another, including an overzealous cop (Robert Duvall) who&#039;s determined to bring Foster down.

MPAA: Rated R for violence and strong language

RunTime: 113 min

Video: NTSC Widescreen 2.35:1

Languages: Dolby Surround: English, French

Subtitles: English, French

Other features: Theatrical Trailer

DVD: DVD-5 -> DVD-5
